title: NEXMOW
description:
Unlock business growth with NEXMOW! URSROBOT's cutting-edge robotic mower. Say goodbye to laborious mowing tasks and hello to enhanced efficiency. Whether solo or in a fleet, NEXMOW effortlessly handles expansive landscapes, freeing up your crew's time for impactful projects. Enjoy hassle-free operation with wire-free freedom, thanks to NEXMOW's boundary wire elimination. Plus, with satellite and 4G connectivity, achieve precise outdoor navigation with an unrivaled 2 cm accuracy, revolutionizing precision mowing.

NEXMOW key features include:

4G LTE & RTK Precision Remote Control
Professional-grade systematic mowing patterns boosts productivity.
Real-Time Remote Control with GPS tracking, productivity reports, and machine monitoring.
Cloud-Based Fleet Collaboration Management
Map large, complex fields or entire city parks with ease using our technology.
Deploy up to 10 mowers for 10X productivity, guided by AI for optimal patterns.
Automatic Safety Sensor
Multiple sensors enable obstacle avoidance, trigger alerts, and stop blades.
Security device tracks via GPS, alerts app on theft.
